channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dem senator reveals deal that secured shutdown's fate — says it was 'worth it' to stop federal layoffs
item.description: Democrats failed to extend Obamacare subsidies, but Sen. Tim Kaine won federal workforce protections in the government shutdown deal.

item.title: Now Can We Stop Pretending That It Was Republicans Who Shut Down the Government?
item.description: People who voted against reopening the government, denounced the vote, and vow to fight on were never against the shutdown.

item.title: RFK Jr. Probes Health Dangers Of Offshore Wind Turbines
item.description: While offshore wind farms’ effect on marine life has garnered much attention, the human element has been largely neglected.

item.title: The Left May Owe Justice Jackson an Apology on SNAP Benefits
item.description: The justice played a bad hand about as well as it could be played.

item.title: Reporter's Notebook: Paul stands firm against spending bill as shutdown clock ticks
item.description: Rand Paul blocks Senate vote on government funding over hemp regulations, potentially extending shutdown through complex procedural delays.
